title: League community Ts3
body:
Hey there! i just had a deep thought about getting the community together and since i am a very social person and love talking to randoms don't ask me why =P so i went ahead and made a TeamSpeak3 server and i would love for anyone that is the same as me "Social speaker" to join i would love it to grow and be a way for people to communicate easy.
TeamSpeak3 server : 101.176.11.76 (Melbourne based)
